class.name: FixedElapsedTime

javadoc.text:
Stops after a fixed amount of time has elapsed. *

* The first time {@link #isSatisfied(Population)} is invoked, the end time of the evolution is determined based on the * provided maxTime value. Once the elapsed time reaches the configured maxTime value,{@link #isSatisfied(Population)} returns true.

javadoc.param: maxTime maximum number of seconds generations are allowed to evolve
javadoc.throws: NumberIsTooSmallException if the provided time is < 0

javadoc.param: maxTime maximum time generations are allowed to evolve
unit {@link TimeUnit} of the maxTime argument
javadoc.throws: NumberIsTooSmallException if the provided time is < 0

javadoc.text: Determine whether or not the maximum allowed time has passed. * The termination time is determined after the first generation.
javadoc.return: true IFF the maximum allowed time period has elapsed
